    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Warden's Wellspring](/Feats.aspx?ID=1777) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 133 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Warden's Focus](/Feats.aspx?ID=1776)

</column>

---

You command unparalleled focus when you commune with the world around you. If you have spent at least 3 Focus Points since the last time you [Refocused](/Actions.aspx?ID=71), you recover 3 Focus Points when you Refocus instead of 1.
